description:
SAP HANA is a game changing and best selling product in the history of SAP. Helping companies solve data,reporting,latency challenges and unleash their potential with a real time platform. Learn it by implementing real time use cases, get started with the new and exciting world of real time reporting, analytics and big data.

Key Learnings:

  1. 80+ lectures of Professionally authored content
  2. Understand why SAP HANA, Concepts, Architecture and Use cases
  3. Get Comfortable with SAP HANA landscape, associated tools and Studio
  4. Learn the different methods and tools to get data from SAP and Non-SAP Sources
  5. Learn In-Memory modeling techniques
  6. Learn to Build reports on BOBJ reporting stack
  7. Certification simulation after each topic
  8. Immediately usable skills, put it to use in your current project or join a new project.

Engaging Teaching:

  1. Expressive and immersive teaching with demonstrations and learning tools
  2. Small, purposeful videos, packed with information, designed specifically for a virtual self paced audience.
  3. Exercises, Tailored reading material and quizzes.
title: SAP HANA Implementation, Modeling and Reporting Course
